lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : bravahitmakers
[00:01.00] 作词 : Etiraz99/M2K/Nutul
[00:09.419]Etiraz99
[00:10.745]leila leila leila leila
[00:13.197]minigdin kiqima disagmu mayli baby
[00:15.598]亲爱的，如果你想放弃我也是你的选择
[00:15.831]yurugum unmas iradam sunmas
[00:18.295]但是我的初衷不变，心也不会变
[00:18.582]san bolmisag kunlirim hoxallikka tolmas
[00:21.030]因为没有你的生活，我将无法想象
[00:21.215]asta kilisa aldirmay
[00:23.744]你慢慢的走过来
[00:23.947]eytking ba maga qandurmay
[00:25.822]想在我的耳边说悄悄话
[00:26.025]eytking ba yurak sozugni
[00:28.019]那些你心里想的甜言蜜语
[00:28.278]nimix kilisa hazirgiqa qirah yandurmay
[00:31.540]何必要藏在心里呢
[00:31.793]etiraz99 axik boldi saga
[00:34.693]我已经深深的被你迷住
[00:35.141]soalla sorisam jawab bamidig maga
[00:36.973]想问的问题也即将浮出水面
[00:37.223]taliyimmu bommisa
[00:38.248]即使我运气不好
[00:38.508]taliwimga unimisag katkin yirakka
[00:42.181]也不希望你离我远去
[00:42.418]sora soygunumni sora
[00:46.364]敢问我心里你的地位
[00:46.584]saga bolgan hesyatimnig hammisi togra
[00:52.896]将是毋庸置疑的第一位
[00:53.118]sora soygunumni sora
[00:56.994]敢问我心里你的地位
[00:57.255]saga bolgan hesyatimnig hammisi togra
[01:03.116]将是毋庸置疑的第一位
[01:03.456]M2K
[01:03.979]turup kal yenimda katmigin san yirakka
[01:08.673]希望你不要离我远去
[01:08.886]turup kal yenimda katmigin san yirakka
[01:14.048]希望你不要离我远去
[01:14.292]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[01:19.438]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
[01:19.695]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[01:24.928]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
[01:25.132]turup kal yenimda katmigin san yirakka
[01:30.074]希望你不要离我远去
[01:30.328]turup kal yenimda katmigin san yirakka
[01:35.456]希望你不要离我远去
[01:35.726]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[01:40.962]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
[01:41.181]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[01:46.114]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
[01:46.426]Nutul
[01:46.798]zinaklirigdin orgilay kiz atrapigda qorgilay
[01:49.102]你让我为你着迷
[01:49.367]u seni gul qiqak disa man asmanda hor bilay
[01:51.621]我对你会比他对你还要好
[01:51.836]ozumga maggu jor bilay bahtimni bir sandin tilay
[01:54.430]把你捧在手心里百般呵护
[01:54.656]asmandin uzalmayma yultuz man saga bir gul beray
[01:56.872]给你你想要的每个东西
[01:57.104]ulguray kalbimga salgan notidin gul undurup
[01:59.569]为你打造出属于我们的一片天空
[01:59.760]kuldurup otima seni hoxallikka qomdurup
[02:02.246]因为只有我才能让你幸福
[02:02.462]yurma meni koydurup ot azabini surdurup
[02:04.693]所以我恳求你不要离开我
[02:04.916]billa bolgin man bilanla yuray ozumni bildurup
[02:07.501]希望我们能在一起到死去
[02:07.719]kondurup aldig kalbimni siyakigga man mastana
[02:10.440]因为只有你的容貌是最美的
[02:10.690]seni qokum koglap yetima san man uqun bir dana
[02:13.134]我会待你为唯一
[02:13.358]sozlurugdur durdana mini kildig parwana
[02:15.429]只有你是最适合我的
[02:15.658]kilma meni sarsana bolayli biz apsana
[02:17.724]所以让我们成为永远的神话吧
[02:18.103]M2K
[02:18.436]qiraylih kizbala
[02:20.461]qiraylih kizbala
[02:22.988]美丽的女孩儿
[02:23.287]qiraylih kizbala
[02:26.135]qiraylih kizbala
[02:28.251]美丽的女孩儿
[02:28.581]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[02:33.996]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
[02:34.226]san unigga koyunsag umu seni soyidu
[02:37.626]因为爱你的人肯定会对你百般照顾
